About Me

The guy also known as "Thunderent" around the web.

Summary

Hi, I'm Robert! Currently based in Timisoara, Romania. I have 4 years experience working as a Freelancer 3D Artist for various game projects. I am the solo developer for the upcoming Steam game, Dream of Me.

I am a recent graduate from West University of Timisoara with a Degree in Computer Science. I enjoy building various apps and programs and look forward to getting better as a Software Developer.
